text:
- [Voiceover] SAP systems
support customers'
mission critical business processes.
Many SAP systems still reside on premises
and have grown increasingly expensive

and difficult to operate,
scale, and update.
As the global business landscape changes,

you may need to transform how
you operate and deliver value.
For more than 15 years, AWS and SAP

have partnered in the cloud
with proven approaches
to help thousands of joint customers
successfully navigate this journey.

With AWS, you can migrate and
modernize any SAP workload,

innovate faster and drive
new business insights
using the world's most secure, reliable,
and extensive cloud infrastructure.
Whether you want to move to S/4 HANA
through Rise with SAP,
or migrate existing systems,

AWS can help you accelerate
your SAP transformation
and to help you modernize and transform
your business processes,
you can extend your SAP applications
to over 200 native AWS services,
as well as the broadest set

of SAP business technology
platform services
available anywhere.

Join the thousands of SAP
customers who choose AWS,

the proven cloud to innovate
with any SAP workload.
